item.title: Data Saturday #0009 - Data Toboggan - Cool Runnings Virtual
item.description: Azure Synapse Analytics is a practically limitless analytics service that brings together data integration, enterprise data warehousing and big data analytics. Let's spend a day exploring and showcasing these capabilities. We are excited our virtual event 'Cool Runnings' is on Saturday 12 June 2021 and is free to attend.
